tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DNA_Sequence (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sequence TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE dna_sequences (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sequence TEXT NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE genes (
  gene_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sequence_id UUID,
  gene_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  gene_type TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY(sequence_id) REFERENCES dna_sequences(id)
)

CREATE TABLE mutations (
  mutation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_id UUID,
  mutation_type TEXT NOT NULL,
  mutation_position INT,
  FOREIGN KEY(gene_id) REFERENCES genes(gene_id)
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  username TEXT NOT NULL,
  email TEXT UNIQUE,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE sequence_variants (
    variant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sequence_id UUID,
    variant_type TEXT,
    position INT,
    impact TEXT
);
